item.title: Disney stock surges on streaming growth, guidance
item.description: Revenue for Disney's entertainment segment – which includes the traditional TV networks, direct-to-consumer streaming and films – increased 14% year o...

item.title: Cisco reports fourth straight quarter of declining revenue
item.description: Cisco reported better-than-expected results for the latest quarter but revenue continues to shrink.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock surges almost 30% to near all-time high after company's Q3 results
item.description: Rocket Lab jumped in trading after the company reported third-quarter results.

item.title: Super Micro shares plunge 17% after company says no timetable for annual results, issues weak guidance
item.description: Super Micro, the embattled server maker, reported preliminary first-quarter results on Tuesday.

item.title: Tencent posts better-than-expected 47% profit surge as games, AI tools shine
item.description: Chinese gaming and social media giant Tencent on Wednesday reported profit above analysts' expectations, while revenue missed slightly.
